blockquote.p: The size of the state is r.

discussion.p: However, this is not quite consistent with the remainder of the paragraph which specifies a total of nr+1 items in the textual representation of the state. We recommend the sentence be corrected to match:

blockquote.p: The size of the state is nr+1.

discussion.p: To give meaning to the coefficient n, it may be also desirable to move n's definition from later in the paragraph. Either of the following seem reasonable formulations:

blockquote.p: With n=..., the size of the state is nr+1.
The size of the state is nr+1, where n=... .

resolution.note: Jens: I plead for "NAD" on the grounds that "size of state" is only used as an argument for big-O complexity notation, thus constant factors and additions don't count.
Berlin: N1932 adopts the proposed NAD.
